subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Public opinion about Les Bleus, the 1998 World Cup champions, has soured since their mutiny at the 2010 World Cup, and the French have yet to re-embrace the team.
snippet: Public opinion about Les Bleus, the 1998 World Cup champions, has soured since their mutiny at the 2010 World Cup, and the French have yet to re-embrace the team.
